The infographic was published on March 1: 2020, on a Facebook page called "Systemhub Distribution Inc."
The claim states that COVID: 19 symptoms last for nine days, starting with a fever and a mild sore throat, and ending with a "messy fever" and difficulty breathing.
A similar infographic crediting: SystemHUB" was shared in separate Facebook posts.
International health authorities: such as the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the World Health Organization, have released information contradicting the timeline presented in the misleading posts.
